auth.noPermission: You don't have permission to access this page.
auth.doesNotHavePermission: does not have permission to access this page.

barcode.scannerSubtitle: Scan and manage barcodes for production tracking
barcode.scannerModeDescription: Automatically capture barcodes from scanner. Results will be automatically cleared after each scan for continuous scanning.
barcode.manualModeDescription: Enter barcodes manually using the keyboard. Results will be preserved until manually cleared.
barcode.barcodeNotFound: Barcode not found. Please check the barcode and try again.
barcode.failedToScan: Failed to scan barcode. Please try again.
barcode.batchNotFound: Batch not found. Please check the barcode.
barcode.serverError: Server error. Please try again or contact support.
barcode.failedToUpdate: Failed to update batch. Please try again.
barcode.phaseRestriction: You can only scan items in the {role} phase
barcode.barcodeScannedSuccessfully: The barcode has been scanned and information retrieved successfully.
barcode.barcodeUpdatedSuccessfully: The barcode has been scanned and updated successfully.

barcodeManagement.title: Barcode Management
barcodeManagement.subtitle: View, filter, and manage barcodes
barcodeManagement.subtitleForRole: View, filter, and manage barcodes for {role} department
barcodeManagement.noBarcodesFound: No barcodes found matching your filters.
barcodeManagement.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this barcode?
barcodeManagement.confirmBulkDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {count} selected barcodes?
barcodeManagement.selectBarcodesToDelete: Please select at least one barcode to delete.
barcodeManagement.selectBarcodesToPrint: Please select at least one barcode to print.
barcodeManagement.successfullyPrinted: Successfully printed {count} barcodes {times} times each on {printer}
barcodeManagement.failedToPrint: Failed to print barcodes. Please try again.
barcodeManagement.selectBarcodesToArchive: Please select at least one barcode to archive.
barcodeManagement.confirmBulkArchive: Are you sure you want to archive {count} selected barcodes? This action will move them to the archived batches table.
barcodeManagement.failedToArchive: Failed to archive barcodes. Please try again.
barcodeManagement.selectBarcodesToRecover: Please select at least one archived barcode to recover.
barcodeManagement.confirmBulkRecover: Are you sure you want to recover {count} selected archived barcodes? This action will move them back to the active batches.
barcodeManagement.failedToRecover: Failed to recover archived barcodes. Please try again.
barcodeManagement.confirmRecover: Are you sure you want to recover this archived barcode?
barcodeManagement.confirmDeleteArchived: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this archived barcode?

userManagement.title: User Management
userManagement.subtitle: Create and manage system users
userManagement.creator: Creator
userManagement.adminPermissions: Admin: Full access to all features
userManagement.creatorPermissions: Creator: Access to bulk barcode creation and management
userManagement.cuttingPermissions: Cutting: Barcode scanning and management for cutting phase
userManagement.sewingPermissions: Sewing: Barcode scanning and management for sewing phase
userManagement.packagingPermissions: Packaging: Barcode scanning and management for packaging phase

bulkBarcode.title: Bulk Barcode Creation
bulkBarcode.subtitle: Upload an Excel file to create multiple barcodes at once
bulkBarcode.dragDropText: Click to browse or drag and drop your file here
bulkBarcode.foundErrors: Found {count} rows with errors. Please fix them before submitting.
bulkBarcode.requiredColumns: Required columns: client, model, size, color, quantity, layers, serial
bulkBarcode.headerRowRequired: First row must be header row
bulkBarcode.badRequest: The server could not process the request. Please check your file and try again.
bulkBarcode.validationError: There was a validation error with the submitted data.
bulkBarcode.networkError: A network error occurred. Please check your connection and try again.
bulkBarcode.successfullySubmitted: Successfully submitted {count} rows. {duplicates} duplicates found. {errors} rows were skipped due to errors.
bulkBarcode.defectiveDescription: Check this box to mark all barcodes in this batch as defective (second rate). This will add a 'DEFECT' label when printing.
